reviews.review_msg: I'm so glad I took this course with Ryan.  He is very helpful and accessible if you have questions about essay topics and creates a relaxed atmosphere in lecture and tutorial.  He's funny too!  Overall, a great prof.

She's really kind and caring, I would definitely recommend her. Always available and willing to help. Thankfully also not monotone like many English Profs! She also knows how to really get you engaged with the material and even brings in guests :)

Dr. Leith is an erudite professor. She offers a unique course & does her best to make dry authors' works an interesting read. She provides excellent class notes on the material & is a strong lecturer. Overall, she is a caring professor & gives you great, detailed feedback. She is a fair marker, the grade you receive reflects the work you put in. A+
Best English professor at SFU. He is organized, clear, interesting, entertaining and fair.
Prof is incredibly rude and impatient! WILL impact your mental health with her belittling attitude while you are just trying to reach out for help!

i had her for romantic lit, and she was all right.  i didn't have a direct problem with her, and i don't have any reason not to like her.  she is really helpful though, for papers.  take advantage of her office hours.
